contactForm.heading: Let Us Help You
contactForm.subHeading: Get a free consultation from our team
contactForm.description: You can write to us at any time and we will respond to your messages as soon as possible

footer.aboutDescription: SA Cosmos is more than a job board, it's a dynamic ecosystem where talent meets opportunity. Elevate your career with us as you navigate through a plethora of offerings!

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.welcome: Welcome to SA COSMOS Trading GmbH!
aboutUs.description: SA-COSMOS in Germany, a global company for networking, consulting, and partnership building.
aboutUs.visionDescription: Our focus is on finding highly qualified workers in the North African region, whom we provide comprehensive support in order to prepare them linguistically and culturally for living conditions in Germany and to integrate them into the German labor market.
aboutUs.missionDescription: We aim to support and promote talented professionals to help them reach their potential in Germany. We also address Germany’s growing shortage of skilled workers by providing companies with a curated selection of talents, eliminating the need for lengthy recruitment processes.

howItWorks.title: How Cosmos Works
howItWorks.description: Explore our latest job listings and find your dream job!
howItWorks.registerDescription: Sign up for free and discover what new services Cosmos has to offer.
howItWorks.searchDescription: Browse through open positions to find the right job for you.
howItWorks.applyDescription: Apply to a job with your resume and change your career.

step1.title: Language training and certification
step1.description: The participants have a German language diploma according to the ÖSD standard

step2.title: Intercultural training
step2.description: Cultural and social content on work-related topics

step3.title: Certifications
step3.description: Certificates, exams, approval certificates, etc. are translated and certified.

step4.title: Application documents
step4.description: CVs and applications are prepared according to German standards. An online job interview can be arranged at any time

step5.title: Visa matters
step5.description: Documents required for entry are requested from the boating company

step6.title: Transfer
step6.description: Entry and accommodation for skilled workers is guaranteed
